title: Message to The International Benjamin Franklin Society.
text:
My dear Mr. Stout:

The world today more than ever needs the breadth of vision and the wisdom so conspicuously exemplified in the life of Benjamin Franklin. I shall hope that the meeting of the International Benjamin Franklin Society may be helpful in the development of such an attitude. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. J. Robert Stout, President, The International Benjamin Franklin Society, 2305 Woolworth Building, New York City]
